CheckTitle: Ensure Conditional Access Policies Have Session Controls Configured
Description: Checks if at least one enabled Conditional Access policy has session controls configured.
Risk: If no enabled Conditional Access policies have session controls, session security may be insufficient.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > Security > Conditional Access. 3. Edit policies to configure session controls.

Recommendation.Text: Configure session controls in Conditional Access policies to enhance session security.

Notes: This check validates that at least one enabled Conditional Access policy has session controls configured.
